title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, embed, pull, push, create and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python library.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package: use Ollama models as LLMs, embedders or tool-calling agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI): markdown, code highlighting, multi-model chats, admin panel.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama written in Rust: browse, chat, manage models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama: chat, embeddings, model management, streaming & async support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama: simple idiomatic interface to chat and embed with local models.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that streams answers from Ollama via the ollama-js SDK.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration: use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama with async streaming and model management.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Docker Compose stacks adding GPU support, Open-WebUI, Postgres vector store and NGINX reverse proxy.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selectors and autoscaling.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to chat, generate code and refactor using any Ollama model without leaving the editor.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models on Windows, macOS and Linux.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Official Elixir library wrapping the Ollama REST API with GenServer-backed streaming.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfiles for fine-tuned, code, multilingual and uncensored models ready to pull.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into your server with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.
